Title: Redemption (1)
Plot: Tragedy reunites Teal'c with his son, who blames him for the death of his mother. O'Neill and Carter launch a risky plan with untested technology when Earth comes under attack by the Goa'uld.
GuestStars: Christopher Kennedy, David Hewlett, Tobias Mehler, Carrie Richie, Craig McNair, Ivan Cermak, Aleks Paunovic, Michael Soltis
